title: ReKillers v1.0 + Mod
description:
WARNING! This game requires a dual-core (or higher) android device for best performance.

The Outbreak has just begun...
Fears of infection have forced many to hide...
Others, vowed to defend humanity against the undead...
These brave defenders were dubbed ... "ReKillers"

WHATS GOING ON?
Take control of ReKillers, a ragtag band of defenders dedicated to protecting humanity in this unique blend of Tower Defense and Strategy gameplay. Surivors have sought refuge in a suburban mansion and it's up to the ReKillers to stop the invading Zombies!

HERE THEY COME!
Fight off the Zombie mobs with a variety of weapons like Crossbows, Chainsaws, Shock Rifles, Shotguns, Flamethrowers, Machine Guns, Grenade Launchers and more!

UPGRADE YOUR WEAPONS!
Upgrade your ReKillers to improve their weapons and increase their damage powerÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

UNLEASH RAGE!
Unleash a ReKiller's RAGE to launch a frenzy of devastating burst attacks!

APPLY BOOSTERS!
Supercharge ReKillers with BOOSTERS like Double Damage, Double Health, Double Coins, Double Rage and othersÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

SET TRAPS!
Place traps around the mansion to strengthen your defenses...

STOP THOSE ZOMBIE MOBS!
Drop "Mob Stoppers", giant super weapons, to turn the tide in humanity's favorÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

NOTE: This app contains in-app purchases but they are optional and not required to complete the game.

Instructions:

1.Install the APK
2.Copy 'com.fossilsoftware.rekillers' folder to 'Sdcard/Android/Obb'
3.Launch the Game
